summary: Puts the Masque of Pikachu Vile into the Game (a texture replacer for the masque of Clavicus vile)
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]https://imageshack.us/scaled/large/19/banner800x274.jpg[/IMG]

I made this mod just for fun. It is a texture replacer for the Masque of Clavicus Vile 

To Install, just extract the archive contents in your skyrim data folder. Enjoy!

You can add the masque into your inventory by using the console (~) command below: 

player.additem D2846 1


2 VERSIONS AVAILABLE
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/1000024929][IMG]https://imageshack.us/scaled/large/163/pikav1.jpg[/IMG]
VERSION 0.1 (CLOSED MOUTH)[/URL]
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/download/1000024943][IMG]https://imageshack.us/scaled/large/404/pikav21480x270.jpg[/IMG]
VERSION 0.2 (OPEN MOUTH)[/URL]


[center][size=20]Check out also my other mods:[/size]
